# Filmfare Award Bangla for Best Film

The Filmfare Award Bangla for Best Film is an award, which is presented annually at the Filmfare Awards Bangla to the best Bengali film according to a jury. It is given by the Filmfare magazine of the Times Group as a part of the Bengali segment of the Filmfare Awards.
